af_ZA {
    AddressFormat { 
        PostalFormat { "%f%N%a%N%d%N%b%N%s %h %e %r%N%%z %T%N%c%N" }
    }
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: CountryISBNNumber */
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: CountryNumber */
    CurrencyElements { 
            "R",
            "ZAR ",
            ",",
    }
    Identification { 
        Title { "Afrikaans locale for South Africa" }
        Source { "RAP" }
        Address { "" }
        Contact { "" }
        Email { "bug-glibc@gnu.org" }
        Telephone { "" }
        Fax { "" }
        Language { "Afrikaans" }
        Territory { "South Africa" }
        Audience { "" }
        Application { "" }
        Abbreviation { "" }
        Revision { "1.0" }
        Date { "2000-06-29" }
    }
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: LanguageLibraryUse */
    Measurement { "Metric" }
    Messages { 
        YesExpression { "[jJ].*" }
        NoExpression { "[nN].*" }
        YesStr { "" }
        NoStr { "" }
    }
    NameFormat { 
        NamePattern { "%d%t%g%t%m%t%f" }
        GeneralSalutaion { "" }
        ShortSalutationMr { "" }
        ShortSalutationMiss { "" }
        ShortSalutationMrs { "" }
        LongSalutationMr { "" }
        LongSalutationMiss { "" }
        LongSalutationMrs { "" }
    }
    NumberElements { 
            ",",
            ".",
            ";",
            "%",
            "0",
            "#",
            "-",
            "E",
            "\u2030",
            "\u221E",
            "\uFFFD",
    }
    NumberPatterns { 
            "#,##0.###;-#,##0.###",
            "\u00A4#,##0.00;-\u00A4#,##0.00",
            "#,##0%",
    }
    TelephoneFormat { 
        InternationalFormat { "+%c %a %l" }
        DomesticFormat { "" }
        InternationalDialCode { "" }
        InternationalPrefix { "27" }
    }
    calendar{
        gregorian{
            AmPmMarkers{
                    "VM",
                    "NM",
            }
            DateTimePatterns{
                    "hh:mm:ss",
                    "hh:mm:ss",
                    "hh:mm:ss",
                    "hh:mm:ss",
                    "EEE dd MMM yyyy  z",
                    "EEE dd MMM yyyy hh:mm:ss z",
                    "dd/MMMM/yy",
                    "dd/MMMM/yy",
                    "{1} {0}",
            }
            dayNames{
                format{
                    abbreviated{
                            "So",
                            "Ma",
                            "Di",
                            "Wo",
                            "Do",
                            "Vr",
                            "Sa",
                    }
                    wide{
                            "Sondag",
                            "Maandag",
                            "Dinsdag",
                            "Woensdag",
                            "Donderdag",
                            "Vrydag",
                            "Saterdag",
                    }
                }
            }
            monthNames{
                format{
                    abbreviated{
                            "Jan",
                            "Feb",
                            "Mar",
                            "Apr",
                            "Mei",
                            "Jun",
                            "Jul",
                            "Aug",
                            "Sep",
                            "Okt",
                            "Nov",
                            "Des",
                            "",
                    }
                    wide{
                            "Januarie",
                            "Februarie",
                            "Maart",
                            "April",
                            "Mei",
                            "Junie",
                            "Julie",
                            "Augustus",
                            "September",
                            "Oktober",
                            "November",
                            "Desember",
                            "",
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
